name: Speed Race (itch) (OrangeScientist1)
description:
Speed Race is a game where you race your friends and family in a timed platformer game to see who can get to the end the fastest.

PLEASE report any bugs you find in the comments.

AS A NOTE: As of right now, the game is not fully complete. I want to fully finish the ending and fix all the bugs by tonight so the game will be  fully complete. Right now, there is a 2 Player mode, a 3 Player mode, and a 4 Player mode.

BUGS: Once you finish all the 20 levels, the game will not show the score and will not be able to take you to the main menu.
